lexUnit.name: insensitive.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: showing or feeling no concern for others' feelings.

sentence.text: ` We could n't believe the hospital could be so insensitive .
But the directors of the museum at that time were so insensitive that they actually discouraged her generous offer .
It would obviously be too insensitive to say something in front of the girl .
